dataIdInfo.idPurp: This toolbox contains a set of tools to support the preparation of spatial data for input into the Cumulative Impact Mapping Toolboxes.
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
There are three tools included in this toolbox:

1. Alignment and Projection

2. Area Weighting

3. Add Activity Fields

It is important to note that the tools need to be used in order, but not all the tools will be needed for all datasets. Data may need to be processed through all steps (1,2,3), only steps 2 and 3, or only through step 3, depending on the nature of the data.
